Title: Requires certain public transit authorities and their employees to submit all unresolvable contract negotiations to binding arbitration
Summary: Requires the Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority, the Rochester-Genesee Regional Transportation Authority, the Capital District Transportation Authority and the Central New York Regional Transportation Authority and their employees to submit all unresolvable contract negotiations to binding arbitration.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to resolution of disputes in the course of collective negotiations
